news.title: Jay Som Announces First Album in Six Years, Shares Video for New Song “Float”: Watch
news.summary: Melina Duterte tapped Paramore’s Hayley Williams and Jimmy Eat World’s Jim Adkins for Belong, her follow-up to 2019’s Anak Ko

news.title: New David Bowie Box Set Compiles Output From 2002 to 2016: Listen to a Rarity
news.summary: The 18xLP set I Can’t Give Everything Away (2002-2016) collects Bowie’s final albums, plus rarities and live recordings

news.title: Big Thief Share New Song “All Night All Day”: Listen
news.summary: The steamy second single from Double Infinity

news.title: Soulwax Announce First Album in Seven Years, Share New Songs: Listen
news.summary: Brothers David and Stephen Dewaele describe All Systems Are Lying as “a rock album made without any electric guitars”
